mapper.select: SELECT Person.PersonGuid as id, Fact.Text as refn, Person.FullNameReversed as name FROM Person LEFT OUTER JOIN Fact ON ( Fact.LinkTableID = 5 AND Fact.LinkID = Person.ID AND Fact.FactTypeID IN ( SELECT ID FROM FactType WHERE Tag LIKE '%UID%' OR Tag LIKE '%REFN%' ) ) WHERE Person.PersonGUID = #{id} OR Fact.Text = #{refn}
